channel.title: Stackable
channel.description:
How do I make an Item stackable? tryed adding this
class8.aBoolean176 = true;
and when I compiled I got no errors but The item isnt stackable it just sais 1 above the item but when you get another of the item you just get 2 items that each say 1 above them.

item.title: Stackable
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to item.java and search for

itemStackable[6570] = false;

and below it or above it add

itemStackable[XXXX] = true;

( XXXX - items ID )

the

 = true;

is to make the item stackable

and

 = false;

is to make the item unstackable

Read full topic
